short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When accessing Facebook, replaces all images for cats and all posts for MEOWs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of seeing your friends' pictures of food and political discussions post, but can't get rid of Facebook entirely because you need to manage a page there? Then this extension is for you. Configure which pages you manage and their content will be displayed normally. For everything else, there will be cats.
